title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2021 Comments on Priti Patel’s Behaviour
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Home Secretary, on the Sir Philip Rutnam case on 4 March 2021.
content:
Taxpayers will be appalled at having to pick up the bill for the Home Secretary’s unacceptable behaviour.
